summary: Small mod that allows you to add brows as non-replacers.  Females only right now.
descriptionHtml:
========================================================================
Any Brow by d_rail
========================================================================

Description:
Allows you to add eyebrows to all human and elve females, as non-replacers. They will not be shown on NPCs. Use [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Console]showracemenu[/url] to change your player character's brows. Do not change race or sex, cosmetic changes are fine. Although head colors will reset upon entering menu.
I made two versions for now: 1 Pack, 2 Packs (each pack adds 11 brows)


Install:
Use Nexus Mod Manager or copy
---
AnyBrow.esp
textures
---
into your data folder.
Make sure esp is checked in nmm or Skyrim Launcher. See "How to use" section for further info.


Uninstall:
Delete
---
data/AnyBrow.esp
data/textures/actors/character/femalebrows/AnyBrowPack1
*data/textures/actors/character/femalebrows/AnyBrowPack2
---
*depends what version you are using


How to use:
This is a do-it-yourself mod. Find a brow mod that you like and copy the
dds files (textures) into:
---
data/textures/actors/character/femalebrows/AnybrowPack1
*data/textures/actors/character/femalebrows/AnybrowPack1
---

Each pack should have
---
femalebrow_n.dds
femalebrow_01.dds
femalebrow_02.dds
femalebrow_03.dds
femalebrow_04.dds
femalebrow_05.dds
femalebrow_06.dds
femalebrow_07.dds
femalebrow_08.dds
femalebrow_09.dds
femalebrow_10.dds
femalebrow_11.dds
---

There are example textures in the folders right now (vanilla files), so you will have to replace them.


Comptibility:
()Will not work with beast races, probably not in the future too.
()Works with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8720]Custom Races[/url] and any other race mod that uses Expired's RacialComptibility.esm and scripts.

Brow Mods:
Eyebrows Match Hair by Aluminumfoil
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=627]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=627[/url]

Better Females by Bella by BellaGail
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812[/url]

Coverwomen by mrLenski
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3563]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3563[/url]

RANs Eyebrow Replacer 01-08 by RAN46
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5812]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5812[/url]
author: d_rail
